Docs.param: Name of the column resulting from the transformation of .
Name of column to transform. If set to , the value of the will be used as source.
The number of random Fourier features to create.
If , use both of cos and sin basis functions to create two features for every random Fourier frequency. Otherwise, only cos bases would be used.
The seed of the random number generator for generating the new features (if unspecified, the global random is used).
Docs.summary: Takes column filled with a vector of floats and maps its to a random low-dimensional feature space.
